articles.title: 'We will hunt you down': Joe Biden vows revenge as Isis claims Kabul airport bombings that killed 60 civilians, 13 Americans - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: US president Joe Biden has vowed to avenge the deaths, while at least 160 more were wounded in an attack for which the Islamic State group has claimed responsibility.
articles.content: Two suicide bombers and gunmen have attacked crowds of Afghans flocking to Kabul's airport, transforming a scene of desperation into one of horror in the waning days of an airlift for those fleeing t… [+9000 chars]

articles.title: Monica Lewinsky asked for thong-flashing scene to be added in upcoming ‘American Crime Story’ series - New York Daily News
articles.description: Lewinsky, 48, was a producer on the show, and said the writers initially left the scene out.

articles.title: MLK Is Coming to Battle Royale Video Game Fortnite - Gizmodo
articles.description: The makers of the gaming phenomenon are hoping to educate America's gamer youth on the history of the Civil Rights movement.
articles.content: When you think of the online video game Fortnite, whats the first thing that pops into your head? If you answered the late Civil Rights activist Martin Luther King Jr., then theres good news for you:… [+2157 chars]

articles.title: Pentagon bracing for more attacks after troops killed at Kabul airport - The Star Online
articles.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -American forces in Kabul were bracing for more Islamic State attacks while winding up their evacuation mission, U.S. officials said, as the number of U.S. troops killed in Thursday's suicide bomb attack rose to 13.
